column5: I think it may have been before the board changed over to OFC, but there was a thread where ppl showed off their lure collections.. one guy had built some shelves (made of that metal/wire stuff- the kind of shelves they use for closets, fridges, etc.) and had all his lures hanging from the wires.. sorry I don't remember who it was..  If anyone remembers the name of the thread or can find me the pic again, plz, I would really appreciate it..  trying to come up with something to organize all the fishing gear, lures, etc. a bit better and I thought it was a great idea.  Thanks!  ~CK~
Well I have a suggestion but not the pic your looking for. A large piece of cork board works well to heep all sorts of lures stored...

Thanks, I thought of that too, but something with shelf space would be more appropriate for the space I am working with and the amount of "stuff" needed to be organized. I am thinking along the lines of one of those closet organizer thingys? Maybe someone has some more knowledge/experience with this? I have to fit a lot of stuff into not a lot of space. lol.
That was pigeontroller I believe...had his musky baits hanging above the laundry tub while his wife was out shopping....
~CK~, the pic your looking for was posted by Andy on his board (Musky Striker)quite a while back. Get in touch with him...he'll send you the pic for sure.

Thanks guys, I think irishfield has it...  it looked like it could have been a laundry room, lol.  Roy, I have never been on the Musky Striker board, it was definitely the old OFC board that I saw it. Thanks anyway.
Do you mean this pic?    That was pigeontroller's thread...the link is: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...ic=2044&hl=
YAY!! HAPPY DANCE!! WOOT!!  I had already sent him a pm asking to send it to me but you beat him to it! Thank You!!
I donno if there's enough room there.   Danged muskie gear and it's size.  It's a pretty good idea.
I VOTE CCMT M.V.P OF THE BOARD!  MOST VALUABLE POSTER!  Where did you grab that? How do you do stuff like that? Dang!

Snag...it's quite easy...someone said it was pigeontroller's thread, so I went to his profile and looked at his thread topics.  It wasn't hard to find the right one....maybe I shouldn't tell how easy it is and let some ppl think I'm really good at this internet thing....LOL.
LOL! And I was here trying to do a search for all threads with "lures", "hanging lures", etc... Imagine how much time I wasted..
